ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketAddtlITSMField
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketDecision
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###315-AddtlITSMField
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to modify additional ITSM fields in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###420-Decision
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to change the decision of a ticket in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the additional ITSM field screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###TicketType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket type in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Service
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the service in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ServiceMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###SLAMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Queue
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the queue in the ticket responsible screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Owner
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###OwnerMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Responsible
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket responsible in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###State
ConfigItem.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###StateDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Note
ConfigItem.Description: Allows adding notes in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###NoteMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default subject of a note in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default body of a note in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###InvolvedAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###InformAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ArticleTypeDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default type of the note in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ArticleTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies the different note types that will be used in the system.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Priority
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###PriorityDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Title
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the title fields in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###DynamicField
ConfigItem.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the additional ITSM field screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the additional ITSM field screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the decision screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the decision screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###TicketType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket type in the decision screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Service
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the service in the decision screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ServiceMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###SLAMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Queue
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the queue in the ticket note screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Owner
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###OwnerMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Responsible
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket responsible in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###State
ConfigItem.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###StateDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Note
ConfigItem.Description: Allows adding notes in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###NoteMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default subject of a note in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default body of a note in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###InvolvedAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###InformAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ArticleTypeDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default type of the note in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ArticleTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies the different note types that will be used in the system.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Priority
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###PriorityDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Title
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the title fields in the decision screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###DynamicField
ConfigItem.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the decision screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the decision screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the decision screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMTicketFirstLevelSolutionRate
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the stats module to generate statistics about the average of ITSM ticket first level solution rate.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMTicketSolutionTimeAverage
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the stats module to generate statistics about the average of ITSM ticket solution.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmail###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketClose###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketFreeText###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketOwner###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPending###ShowIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ACLKeysLevel3::Actions###100-Default-ITSM
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which items are available for 'Action' in third level of the ACL structure.
